# Project: Social Media Mobile Application

## Project Overview
This project involved designing and developing a **social media mobile application** aimed at enhancing user engagement and providing a seamless platform for sharing content.

The motivation behind this project was to simplify social media interactions such as posting updates and media, following friends and interests, messaging and notifications, improving accessibility and user experience.

## My Role
I was responsible for designing the application flow and interface, implementing front-end components and ensuring usability and clarity in information presentation.

## Tools & Technologies
- UI/UX wireframing tools
- Front-end development frameworks (Flutter / JavaScript)
- Basic backend integration concepts
